page.title: 10GILMARDEN DANCING SCHOOL.
page.content: Every Saturday and occasionally Wednesday,I attend the local dancing school where I learn disco,latin,ballroom and robotic.Every 6 months we are examined by an external examiner,who assesses the standard we have reached in each of the disciplines.Awards of gold,silver and bronze are obtained.During the exams only the dancer and partner,the examiner and Miss Beverley who provides the music are present.Each type of dance requires a special outfit.For disco I wear a silver fringe and a black leotard.For latin,I have a knee length full circle skirted,tight bodied sleeveless blue and white dress and for ballroom a white and turquoise satin knee length V backed flared dress, with a full circle net sequined skirt,all worn with suede soled shoes.
